verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
We’ll work till Jesus comes,
We’ll work

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Till Jesus comes,
We'll work till Jesus come
And we’ll be gathered home.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
O land of rest, for thee I sigh!
When will the moment come

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
When I shall lay my armor by,
And dwell in peace at home?

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
To Jesus Christ I fled for rest;
He bade me cease to roam,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And lean for succor
on His breast
Till He conduct me home.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
I sought at once
my Saviour’s side,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
No more my steps shall roam;
With Him I’ll brave death’s
chilling tide,
And reach my heavenly home.
